name: Dean Fujioka
description: {{Nihongo|'''Tatsuo Fujioka'''|藤岡 竜雄|Fujioka Tatsuo|born August 19, 1980}}, better known as {{Nihongo|'''Dean Fujioka'''|ディーン・フジオカ|Dīn Fujioka|stylized as '''DEAN FUJIOKA'''}} (also {{zh|t=藤岡靛|s=藤冈靛|p=Ténggāng Diàn|first=t}}), is a Japanese actor, singer-songwriter, musician, model and film director / producer.
